metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16118 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In GNOME Balsa before 2.6.0, a malicious server operator or man in the middle can trigger a NULL pointer dereference and client crash by sending a PREAUTH response to imap_mbox_connect in libbalsa/imap/imap-handle.c.

criterions.comment: balsa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
